name: Crewmates (Among Us)
startIntroPart1: There is an impostor among us..
introduction: I trust you're not one of them?
hateHello: Are you really who you claim to be??
afterPeace: Guess you aren't so sus afterall...
uniqueText:
+10% science while at peace, 
 -10% science while at war 
 +10% production while at war

name: Impostors (Among Us)
startIntroPart1: There is an impostor among us..
introduction: I trust you're not one of them?
hateHello: Are you really who you claim to be??
afterPeace: Guess you aren't so sus afterall...
uniqueText: Earn 50% of damage dealt in science, increases to 100% post medieval era
uniques: Earn [50]% of the damage done to [All] units as [Science] <before the [Medieval era]>
Earn [100]% of the damage done to [All] units as [Science] <starting from the [Medieval era]>

name: The Empire (Rimworld)
startIntroPart1: Crashing upon this ancient world, you strive to lead it to greatness
declaringWar: Thou art an uneducated freak! Thou shalt have no place in the empire!
attacked: I take not kindly to fools!
defeated: Is this how i fall? A mere peasant on a rimworld...
neutralNo: I cannot agree to that mine friend.
neutralYes: A gracious agreement for all parties!
hateHello: Oh look, the caveman wishes to speak.
hateNo: Just as foolish as i thought
hateYes: Thou may be a fool..but an agreeable one.
afterPeace: I see thou hath come to thine senses
tradeRequest: I hope this deal finds you well.
uniqueText:
Every city state you control gives you 25% of its science, culture, gold, and faith yields 
 Gain 25% more influence from gold gifts to city states
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [25]% more Influence
Allied City-States provide [Culture] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Faith] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
